author: FOX Sports
title: Wimbledon – the world's greatest tennis tournament – is cancelled and social media is reacting
description: Roger Federer, Serena Williams and other tennis stars are taking to social media in the wake of Wimbledon's cancellation on Wednesday.
content:
We hadn’t heard much from the tennis world in the midst of the coronavirus pandemic. That changed on Wednesday.
It is with great regret that the AELTC has today decided that The Championships 2020 will be cancelled due to public health concerns linked to the… [+7573 chars]
